textos_fuente.text: Dixie Roadhouse, Bar at 1023 SE 47th Terrace, Cape Coral Home Countries Articles About Add Listing Delete Edit Bar Night Club Dixie Roadhouse 1023 SE 47th Terrace, Cape Coral, FL 33904, USA United States Florida About Dixie Roadhouse is a bar, located at 1023 SE 47th Terrace, Cape Coral, FL 33904, USA. They can be contacted via phone at +1 239-541-7900 , visit their website www.thedixie.com for more detailed information. Tags : #PointOfInterest, #Establishment Location : 1023 SE 47th Terrace, Cape Coral, FL 33904, USA Contacts : +1 239-541-7900 www.thedixie.com Added by Jopie , at 23 January 2017 Summary Dixie Roadhouse, located at 1023 SE 47th Terrace in Cape Coral, Florida, is a vibrant nightlife destination known for its lively atmosphere and country-themed entertainment. This venue stands out as a popular spot for both locals and visitors looking to enjoy a fun night out. With its spacious dance floor and energetic vibe, it’s a go-to place for those who love to dance, especially to country music and line dancing. The décor reflects a classic Southern charm, creating a welcoming environment that encourages guests to let loose and have a good time. The bar at Dixie Roadhouse offers a variety of drinks, including signature cocktails, beers, and a selection of wines. Patrons often rave about the friendly bartenders who are quick to serve and always ready to recommend a drink. The drink specials are a highlight, making it an affordable option for those looking to enjoy a night out without breaking the bank. The venue also features a menu with tasty bar bites, perfect for fueling up before hitting the dance floor. Live music and DJ performances are a staple at Dixie Roadhouse, drawing in crowds eager to enjoy the entertainment. The venue frequently hosts themed nights, which can include everything from line dancing lessons to live bands playing popular country hits. This variety keeps the experience fresh and exciting, ensuring that there’s always something new to enjoy. Many guests appreciate the opportunity to learn some dance moves, making it a great place for both seasoned dancers and beginners. Reviews from visitors often highlight the friendly and welcoming atmosphere. Many people mention how the staff goes above and beyond to ensure everyone has a great time. The crowd tends to be diverse, with a mix of ages and backgrounds, which adds to the overall fun. Guests frequently comment on the sense of community that Dixie Roadhouse fosters, making it a place where friendships can be formed over shared experiences on the dance floor. The venue also offers ample space for private events, making it a popular choice for parties and celebrations. Whether it’s a birthday bash or a corporate gathering, Dixie Roadhouse provides a unique setting that can accommodate various group sizes. The combination of great music, delicious food, and a lively atmosphere makes it an appealing option for those looking to host an event that stands out. Overall, Dixie Roadhouse is more than just a bar; it’s a lively hub of entertainment in Cape Coral. With its engaging atmosphere, friendly staff, and a variety of activities, it’s a place where you can unwind, dance, and enjoy a night out with friends. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this venue promises a memorable experience that captures the spirit of Southern hospitality. Opening Hours Monday Closed Tuesday 7:00 PM – 2:00 AM Wednesday 7:00 PM – 2:00 AM Thursday Closed Friday 7:00 PM – 2:00 AM Saturday 7:00 PM – 2:00 AM Sunday Closed Gallery Add missing information Add email Add business description Add Social Media Add Products and Services 13 Reviews Anonym 19 December 2017 One of the most happening places in this beautiful part of the world. My aunt lives in Cape Coral and I visited her last summer. Liked this particular joint report/reply this review Anonym 14 December 2017 Great place. Only knock against it that Florida bars allow smoking otherwise great fun dancing. report/reply this review Anonym 05 December 2017 One of the better places in town. If you're looking to go dance and have reasonable priced drinks and just an all-out fun time. This is one of the better places in the cape. report/reply this review Anonym 14 November 2017 Too much smoking going on inside there.  Went to enjoy a show, wife and I left before the show started.  It is overwhelming in there with smoke.  Ended up throwing out the hat I was wearing, couldn't get the smell out of it. If you go there be prepared for this. report/reply this review Anonym 18 October 2017 Best drink for the price always fun but you got to watch for barmaids taking their tip in the price they charge you . Know your drink price .  I have seen them take a dollar tip without telling you.  Buyer be aware report/reply this review Anonym 04 October 2017 Coolest bar I've been to in Florida!!!! Lots of fun. They have a hugeeeee group of people square dancing to all kinds of songs. There's like two bar with different themes within it. Good prices on drinks. It is loud and crowded but a good time for sure!!! report/reply this review Anonym 27 September 2017 I love this place.. coming down from Boston where there aren't too many country bars, I'm so excited to have a place this close. Now I just need to learn the line dances report/reply this review Anonym 19 September 2017 It's hit or miss on a good time. That's why it only gets a 3 star rating. report/reply this review Anonym 30 July 2017 Great dancing! Great music! Good drink selections. Just too Smokey. Other than that, I love going to Dixie often! report/reply this review Anonym 22 April 2017 Staff is always kind here , personally I love country itself not line dancing  so I don't go often report/reply this review Anonym 16 April 2017 It was my third time that I ever have went to a country bar but I really enjoyed myself. Great music believe it or not not only country their drinks are simply not mix with water so if you order straight up whiskey hundred percent you'll get straight up black whiskey report/reply this review Anonym 01 April 2017 Lots of fun with excellent music that splices upbeat country with funky dance music!! The only country bar where I actually liked the music. And I'm not even a fan of country. report/reply this review Anonym 30 January 2017 Very lively place with line dancing. You could dance however you like around the dance floor but the majority of people are there for the line dances. Very busy on Saturday night report/reply this review Rate & Write Reviews Review Star : Submit your review Mailing List Sign Up Enter your email to get updates and special deals from Dixie Roadhouse Dixie Roadhouse for sale - Cape Coral Breeze E-Edition Submit News Subscribe News Business Viewpoints Obituaries Sports and Fishing Community Jobs Place Notice close News Cape News Breaking News Business Your Community Florida News National News Sports and Fishing Local Sports Sports Columns SWFL Fishing SWFL Boating Florida Sports National Sports Obituaries Viewpoints Letters To The Editor Editorials Local Columns Life Local Lifestyles Clubs & Organizations Engagements Cape History Cape Coral’s 50th Anniversary Cape Coral’s 40th Anniversary Cape Coral’s 45th Anniversary Hurricane Guide Contact Contact Us Submit News Single Copy Locations Statement of Values Terms of Service Store Classifieds Public Notices Browse notices Place a notice E-Editions Yellow Pages /Breaking News Dixie Roadhouse for sale Longtime owners of the popular Cape nightspot looking to retire Mar 12, 2025 By CJ HADDAD 3 min read The co-owners of a long-standing nightlife spot in Cape Coral are looking to sell. After nearly 15 years of owning and operating Dixie Roadhouse, David Townsend and Lynn Pippenger are ready to retire and say goodbye to the South Cape hotspot known for line dancing, celebrations, and party atmosphere. “We know that the building has a lot of potential,” said Townsend, 70. “Twenty years ago I’d be doing it, I don’t have that in me anymore. We want to leave it with someone who can make things better for the South Cape and Cape Coral overall.” The couple is selling the business, not the building itself. The business package includes a 30-year lease, liquor license, inventory, lease deposit, furniture, fixtures, equipment, intellectual property, and cash flow/market value (calculated from 2023-2024 net income times 2.5 years). The total price tag? $2.675 million. Collectively, Townsend and Pippenger have more than 80 years of nightclub experience in 130-plus nightclubs nationwide. They have served in roles across the spectrum — from nightclub employees, to managers, to corporate owners, to nightclub consultants, to partners, to individual owners of nightclubs, to a director at the largest nightclub company in the world, and an original founding Board Member of the Nightclub & Bar magazine and trade shows. ​​​​​​​In 2011, the couple decided to focus their experience and knowledge into one place, which resulted in the Dixie Roadhouse. “We just wanted everyone to know that we couldn’t have done all of this without the help, expertise, and knowledge of literally thousands of people that we have collaborated with in the nightclub business over the past few decades,” the couple stated. The Dixie has been a staple for events surrounding New Year’s Eve, Bike Nights, and countless occasions and parties. Dixie housed many talented performers during its infancy, such as Blake Shelton, Eli Young Band, and the Misfits. Townsend said they’d like to pass the 10,000-square-foot venue on to someone with expertise in the industry who could take full advantage of the space, and untapped potential. That untapped potential includes a possible rooftop bar expansion, outdoor patio with an island bar, hosting live concerts as they had in the past, and more. “With everything going on down in the South Cape… it’s really developing fast. This building has potential to be part of that,” Townsend said. “We’re still good business. We don’t plan on closing Dixie. It’s still going to be open. It’s not going to really affect the employees or customers. It would depend on what the new owners wanted to do with it, but at least for a while, it’ll be business as usual.” At the moment, Townsend and Pippenger are attempting to locate a purchaser on their own, but would welcome a broker that could bring them a buyer. The duo that know how to throw a party have cherished their time operating Dixie Roadhouse. “Loved it,” Townsend said. “We just know the building and the business have so much more potential. “We’re very proud of the legacy.” When asked if they’ll miss it, Townsend said, “Oh yeah. That’s all I’ve ever done. It’s going to be weird.” Townsend said it’s time to enjoy retirement, his grandchildren, and getting to travel, which he said he loves doing. Those interested in purchasing Dixie Roadhouse can find more information by visiting www.legendarynightclubforsale.com. Dixie Roadhouse is at 1023 S.E. 47th Terrace. Dixie Roadhouse in Cape Coral is up for sale, so what's next for the nightclub? Prev Next WFTX Dixie Roadhouse Hits the Market: Iconic Cape Coral nightclub up for sale after nearly 15 years By: Bella Line Posted and last updated Bella Line I'm your Community Correspondent for Cape Coral, Pine Island and Matlacha. I also live in the Cape, so if you see me walking my dog Winnie at Rotary Park, say hello! CAPE CORAL, Fla. — The iconic Dixie Roadhouse in Cape Coral is up for sale! Cape Coral's Community Correspondent Bella Line spoke with a partner, David Townsend, who says that after nearly 15 years, the award-winning nightclub will be under new partnership. Townsend tells Fox 4 he has decided to retire from the nightclub business. A statement on the listing website says: "We just wanted everyone to know that we couldn't have done all of this without the help, expertise, and knowledge of literally thousands of people that we have collaborated with in the nightclub business over the past few decades." Townsend also told Line they are looking for someone who will take the business to the next level and expand it. A statement on the listing website says: "The buyer of this business will be getting the benefit of all of that expertise, in addition to a profitable - and legendary - nightclub business." The website has ideas for future investors to expand the nightclub. Some ideas include a rooftop bar, an outdoor patio with an island bar, live music, and VIP memberships. The price tag is currently at $2.7 million. For more information on the listing, click here . Copyright 2025 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved.
